item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Math is still catching up to the genius of Ramanujan (423 points | 214 comments)
2. First images from Euclid are in (582 points | 179 comments)
3. Performance of popular microcontroller boards running uLisp (15 points | 2 comments)
4. LTESniffer: An Open-Source LTE Downlink/Uplink Eavesdropper (160 points | 18 comments)
5. Just want simple TLS for your .internal network? (36 points | 12 comments)
6. Guide to Fine-Tuning LLMs (110 points | 9 comments)
7. Understanding Gaussians (6 points | discuss)
8. A Controversial Rare-Book Dealer Tries to Rewrite His Own Ending (40 points | 8 comments)
9. An amateur historian has discovered a long-lost short story by Bram Stoker (267 points | 95 comments)
10. Cosine (YC W23) Hiring JavaScript/TS Dev to Build AI SWE ( | hide)
11. Writing a Mathematica Interpreter in Typescript (33 points | 2 comments)
12. Firefox-Passwords-Decryptor: Extracts and decrypts passwords saved in Firefox (74 points | 46 comments)
13. The Multics Maclisp Compiler: The Basic Hackery – A Tutorial (1977) (17 points | discuss)
14. Show HN: Data Formulator – AI-powered data visualization from Microsoft Research (110 points | 9 comments)
15. Civet: A Superset of TypeScript (134 points | 111 comments)
16. Singapore OKs 4,300km subsea cable for importing electricity from Australia (25 points | 24 comments)
17. Paranormasight: A Game Exploring the Depths of Honjo in Tokyo (39 points | 4 comments)
18. How should the new element work? (38 points | 16 comments)
19. Building a Game with the Real Engine (60 points | 15 comments)
20. Overengineering a way to know if people are in my university's CS lab (152 points | 69 comments)
21. New discovery reveals how diatoms capture CO2 so effectively (71 points | 15 comments)
22. Scalene: A high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, memory profiler for Python (114 points | 8 comments)
23. Learning to Learn (101 points | 49 comments)
24. Mind Wandering: More than a Bad Habit (2018) [pdf] (86 points | 31 comments)
25. Apple's AirPods Pro hearing health features (173 points | 95 comments)
26. Thought experiments that fray the fabric of space-time (108 points | 103 comments)
27. Transitioning the Use of Cryptographic Algorithms and Key Lengths (70 points | 26 comments)
28. A near impossible literacy test Louisiana used to suppress the black vote (127 points | 136 comments)
29. ByteDance sacks intern for sabotaging AI project (175 points | 174 comments)
30. Egypt declared malaria-free after 100-year effort (564 points | 58 comments)
